text:
The Pfizer and BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine has been approved by Health Canada. Canada is set to receive four million doses of the Pfizer vaccine by March, including up to 249,000 doses this month. @AdamCHCH reports. #COVID19 #Canada #vaccine
 
WATCH: https://t.co/Thx0h8GcfC https://t.co/QMID6pc2Su
